basics.name: Atul Dhungel
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Software Developer with experience in building scalable applications across AI, automation, and e-commerce. Hands-on with React, Python, FastAPI, and Postgres. Proven record in founding technical projects, managing teams, and delivering reliable backend systems.

work.name: Project Taylor
work.summary: AI-powered resume automation platform using LLMs and job scraping APIs.
highlights: Built modular FastAPI services for AI Copilot and job discovery
Integrated Gemini API, Supabase, and async job orchestration
Created SPA with Vanilla JS + Tailwind, including JSON export
Implemented full testing suite with fallback handling

work.name: Referrify
work.summary: Referral-based SaaS platform with automation and manual failover handling.
highlights: Managed engineering team and customer support agents
Oversaw automation system transition from Selenium to Playwright
Implemented Telegram bot alerts and Discord credential recovery

work.name: Walter
work.summary: Shopify store for Spanish bespoke shoes with CSV automation
highlights: Cleaned and converted vendor CSVs with Python/Pandas for Shopify import
Resolved compatibility issues between bespoke exports and Shopify schema

work.name: Call It
work.summary: Options trading educational game (digital board game).
highlights: Pitched shift from physical to digital prototype
Helped test and log feature bugs, hired developers
Tech stack: AWS, Amplify, Next.js, TypeScript

work.name: Direct Outreach Sales Engine
work.summary: Manual outreach pipeline using Facebook to test demand and close deals.
highlights: Designed warm-up flow for accounts to reduce spam flagging
Peaked at $10K/month in revenue before team conflict/platform issues

work.name: Pari Shringar
work.summary: Nepal-based lingerie microbrand launched around Valentine’s Day.
highlights: Sourced inventory via Alibaba and managed import logistics
Ran IG ad campaigns, processed local QR payments via Khalti

work.name: Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
work.summary: Trained in Java/Angular, assigned to CitiBank and MetLife, but not given active tasks.
highlights: Prepared for Java certification, supported internal handoffs

projects.name: Options Trading & Technical Analysis
projects.description: Traded SPY using multi-leg strategies (iron condors, covered calls). Daily technical analysis via TradingView and macroeconomic research (FOMC, CPI). Executed trades using Tastytrade.
